name: In Nomine Patris
description:
In Nomine Patris  is a video game of horror and investigation set in the 70s

It tells the story about Anne Cunningham, a woman who is experiencing paranormal encounters in her house.

One night she decide to go back to the house and go into the art room, where the music starts playing.

What is happening in the house? 

Or what is happening to Anne?

This versión is just a small demo of what is to come soon.

More rooms.

More floors.

More puzzles.
